2011-03-26

BtVS: Bewitched, Bothered & Bewildered / Who died and made you Elvis?

In all my Oz-love the other lesser-Scoobie is not getting her due. Cordy is great and as well as being a good episode Bewitched, Bothered and Bewildered is a good Cordy episode

That said my favourite line delivery still goes to Oz

But you're not a rat. So call it an upside.
